item.description: Corporate Social Responsibility # Markets, recap… # Market mechanisms vs political mechanisms for resource allocation You get (more!) effecient coordination without central direction in a system of property, contract, and consent. Private vices translate into public benefits Social obligations? CSR # Friedman’s main complain: “socially responsible” business amounts to a kind of fraud A violation of the fiduciary relatioinship between principal (owners, shareholders) and agent (CEO, management).
